wikipedia_page.main: General John Hamilton Dalrymple, 8th Earl of Stair KT (14 June 1771 – 10 January 1853), known as Sir John Dalrymple, 5th Baronet, between 1810 and 1840, was a British soldier and politician.

response: *John Dalrymple, 8th Earl of Stair (1771–1853), British soldier and politician
